title: crypto/aes: S-box cache timing leak
body:
The crypto/aes package uses S-boxes and thus leaks cache timing information.  Techniques to avoid this [are known][1] and should be used on all platforms Go supports.

If Go does not support the needed vector intrinsics, then support for them should be added.

[1]: http://shiftleft.org/papers/vector_aes/
